import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const ContactForm = () => { const { handleSubmit, register, setValue } = useForm() useEffect(() => { register( { name: 'name' }, { name: 'email' }, { name: 'phone_number' }, { name: 'msg_subject' }, { name: 'message' }, ) }, []) const onsubmit = (values)=>{ const { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message} = values emailjs.send( 'user_ojITwwnFvXK7d1iaDiJ2U','template_rng2cws', { name, email, phone_number, msg_subject, message, }) .then(function(response) { console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text); }, function(err) { console.log('FAILED...', err); }); } return (

Let's make your app !

setValue('name', text, true)} />

setValue('phone_number', text, true)} />
setValue('msg_subject', text, true)} />
) } export default ContactForm
